Package org.forgerock.openam.agent

Class TokenRestrictionResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.agent.TokenRestrictionResolver
  • public class TokenRestrictionResolver
extends Object
    Class to validate agents sending AuthN requests and the resource being accessed, and return the token restriction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TokenRestrictionResolver​(AMIdentityRepositoryFactory identityRepositoryFactory, TokenRestrictionFactory tokenRestrictionFactory)
      Constructor of LDAPAgentValidator instances.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TokenRestrictionResolver

        @Inject
public TokenRestrictionResolver​(AMIdentityRepositoryFactory identityRepositoryFactory,
                                TokenRestrictionFactory tokenRestrictionFactory)
        Constructor of LDAPAgentValidator instances.
        Parameters:
        identityRepositoryFactory - Factory for creating AMIdentityRepository instances.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        public TokenRestriction resolve​(String agentId,
                                String realm,
                                SSOToken adminToken)
                         throws IdRepoException,
                                SMSException,
                                SSOException
        Returns an appropriate token restriction for the given agent.
        Parameters:
        agentId - The id of the agent.
        realm - The realm.
        adminToken - The admin token.
        Returns:
        The TokenRestriction.
        Throws:
        IdRepoException - if the agent's attributes cannot be retrieved.
        SMSException - if a token restriction cannot be created.
        SSOException - if any of the inputs are invalid.

      • resolve

        public TokenRestriction resolve​(String providerId,
                                String gotoUrl,
                                SSOToken adminToken,
                                boolean uniqueSSOTokenCookie)
                         throws IdRepoException,
                                SMSException,
                                SSOException
        Returns an appropriate token restriction for the given agent.
        Parameters:
        providerId - The request's provider id attribute.
        gotoUrl - The goto url attribute.
        adminToken - The admin token.
        uniqueSSOTokenCookie - true if unique SSO token cookie is enabled; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The TokenRestriction.
        Throws:
        IdRepoException - if the agent's attributes cannot be retrieved.
        SMSException - if a token restriction cannot be created.
        SSOException - if any of the inputs are invalid.
